x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Organ donation is a lifesaving act, yet thousands of lives are lost each year due to a lack of awareness, delayed coordination, and absence of a centralized system to track potential donors and recipients. There is a strong need for a transparent, secure, and real-time platform to connect donors, hospitals, and NGOs efficiently.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: LifeLinkNow – Organ Donation Awareness and Tracking Platform
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

App Engine Studio – to build the core organ donor registry and request tracking app.

Flow Designer – to automate donor-recipient matching workflows.

IntegrationHub – to integrate with hospital databases and NGO portals.

Now Mobile – for donor awareness and registration through mobile apps.

Performance Analytics – to track impact metrics and awareness campaign outcomes.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with hospital management systems, verified donor ID databases, and government organ donation APIs.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Ensuring data privacy and HIPAA compliance for sensitive medical information.

Verifying authenticity of donor and recipient records.

Coordinating real-time updates across multiple hospitals and regions.
